transcript:
Customer: Hello

Executive: Hello
Customer: Ji good afternoon sir.
Executive: Hello
Customer: Hello
Executive: Aari hai aawaz aari hai?
Customer: Ji good afternoon sir, Pooja baat kar rahi hu IndiaMART se.
Executive: Good afternoon, good afternoon mam. Kaun baat kar rahe hain?
Customer: Sir main
(automated voice): Aap jis vyakti se baat kar rahe hain, unhone aapke call ko hold par rakha hai. Kripya line par bane rahe.
The person you are speaking with has put your call on hold.
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: Ji sir aawaz, ji good afternoon sir aawaz aa rahi hai aapko meri?
Executive: Aa rahi hai, aa rahi hai.
Customer: Ji sir main Pooja baat karti hu IndiaMART se.
Executive: Accha toh madam ye mujhe na abhi apna ye wala jo account hai na woh apna matlab close karwana hai.
Customer: Kaunsa account close karwana hai sir?
Executive: Ek maine jo ye Rudraam wala khula hua hai na isko mujhe close karwana hai. Toh isme refund vagera kya process rahega?
Customer: Kya naam hai sir company ka?
Executive: Ye Rudraam ke naam se hai na.
Customer: Sorry?
Executive: Rudraam, Rudraam.
Customer: Rudraam?
Executive: Ji.
Customer: Rudraam Enterprises?
Executive: Haan ji.
Customer: Satya Prakash ji baat kar rahe hain aap?
Executive: Haan ji.
Customer: Ji sir bataiye kya dikkat aa rahi hai, kyun band karana chahte hain aap?
Executive: Madam actually mera ek aur account Tripundram ke naam se already ispe hai toh woh humne LLP kar rakha hua tha. Ab woh LLP hatwa ke maine proprietor mein karwaya hai. Aur mera jo purane wala account hai uska exposure kareeban 7.5 year ka hai.
Toh woh waha pe zyada fark padta hai exposure actually lamba rehta hai toh client catch karne mein zyada easy hota hai. Aur ye bhi naya account hai isme exposure kam hai toh ye wala close karwa ke mujhe usi wale account pe continue karna hai.
Customer: But sir is wale account pe toh aapke paas kaafi acchi inquiries aa rahi hai, kaafi acchi calls bhi aa rahi hai matlab aapne last 30 days mein jo hai 500-600 zyada aapne reply kar diya hai customers ko. 100% aap buylead mein active ho, 100% aapke paas calls bhi aa rahi hai. Hai na?
Executive: Active toh hai lekin baat toh ye hoti hai na, baat unse ye hoti hai ki abhi aap naya hai abhi aapke sath show nahi ho raha hai isme time periods. Toh jaldi koi trust nahi kar pa raha hai. Problem ye hai. Baat karne se nahi hota order banne bhi chahiye na.
Customer: Last time sir aap se meri baat hui thi last month mein. Ji. Aapne toh mujhe bataya tha sir ki aapki deal hui hai IndiaMART buyer se.
Executive: Maine aap se bataya tha?
Customer: Ji sir.
Executive: Maine aap se bataya ki deal hui hai mujhe aap se baat kahan hui?
Customer: Sir jab aapki company IndiaMART pe onboard hui thi toh maine hi toh sir aap se baat kiya tha.
Executive: Nahi onboard hote hi main aapko kyun keh dunga ki meri deal ho gayi hai?
Customer: Nahi nahi onboard hone ke baad jab humne aap se meeting ki thi aapki team ke sath bhi meeting ki thi aur humne aap se discussion bhi kiya tha. Toh starting mein aapko maine buyleads jaise aap bata rahe the ki main pan India mein deal karta hu aur meri jo hai Uttarakhand mein deal karta hu. Thik hai aapke jo matlab ayurvedic wale jo
Executive: Buyleads toh buyleads toh chaliye buyleads toh aa rahe hain but deal toh nahi ban rahi hai na, trust toh nahi ho raha hai na. Bande cash on delivery mangte hain cash on delivery nahi ho pata hai. Payment terms mein kahan se trust karu? Ab woh log proprietor kehte hain proprietor.
Customer: Buyer sir aapko
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Buyer cash on delivery mangte hain? Saare buyer aap se cash on delivery mangte hain sir?
Executive: Buyer toh pehli baar jaldi mil hi nahi pa rahe hain.
Toh purane purane mein zyada tar unka exposure zyada accha hai. Aur jab mere paas already already mere paas purana account hai toh phir main naye wale account mein kya kar sakta hu main? Main usi wale account ko continue karwaunga.
Customer: Nahi nahi aisa nahi hai sir dekho aap agar business start kar rahe ho agar aapne ek business ko successfully onboard kiya hai toh dusra business abhi sir iska starting point hai. Dekho sir starting mein jo business hai usme hamesha upar neeche dikkat aati hai thodi bahut. Thik hai lekin aapko jaise aap bata rahe ki matlab customer cash on delivery bol raha hai ya meri deal convert nahi ho rahi hai toh uske liye sir aap mujhe 10-15 minute ka time dijiye hum ek baar meeting karte hain. Hum aapko proper jo hai guide karenge ki aapki initial level pe kaise deal ho sakti hai proper.
Executive: Madam mujhe ye wala ye wala band karwana hai aur mujhe uspe exposure lena hai seven year wale pe exposure lena hai ye mujhe band karwana hai.
Customer: Sir dekhiye aap jo hai IndiaMART
Executive: Humne bhi meeting karke discussion karne ke baad hi humne ye decision liya hai.
Executive: Ki hum log abhi 7.5 year wala jo account hai usko hi hum continue karenge. Ye wala hum close karenge. Toh agar aap ho sakta hai toh iske jo amount hai woh aap usme transfer kar dijiye ya phir isko close karke refund karwa dijiye.
Customer: Sir dekhiye jo refund ki aap baat kar rahe hain aur aap bata rahe hain ki dusri company already chal rahi hai aapki aur usme accha response mil raha hai. Isliye ye wali jo company hai isme bhi sir aap IndiaMART ki agar aap plan kar rahe ho aur aap chahte ho aage jaane ke liye.
Executive: Madam aap force force kyun kar rahe ho? Aap force kyun kar rahe ho mujhe toh batao. Main main aap se apna decision bata raha hu aap mujhe force kar rahe ho ki nahi aap ye chalao ye chalao.
Executive: Maine jab bata diya ki ye wala mujhe
Executive: Hmm.
Executive: Main already aapko dono cheez bata chuka hu na ya toh aap refund karwa dijiye hamara decision final hai. Ye change nahi hone wala isi mein hisab se keh raha hu main ki ya toh aap isko convert karwa dijiye ya phir aap isko close karwa dijiye dono option hai. Agar usme kuch difference ka amount baithega woh hum kar denge.
Executive: Haan.
Customer: Sir dekhiye abhi jaise aap jo reason bata rahe ho uske liye main ek baar apne manager se discuss kar leti hu. Thik hai main aapko jo hai hamare senior manager unse call arrange karwa deti hu. Thik hai aap ek baar unse baat kijiye woh aapko isme best help kar payenge. Thik hai sir?
Executive: Thik hai karwaiye. Abhi kar dijiye.
Customer: Abhi sir aapke paas jo hai manager ka call aa jayega abhi thodi der mein main aapke liye call arrange karwa rahi hu sir team se. Thik hai sir toh aap thoda sa time dijiye. Haan manager aapko call back karenge. Thik hai sir?
Executive: Ji.
Customer: Okay sir. Thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants to close Rudraam Enterprises account.

- Wants refund for Rudraam Enterprises account.

- Prefers to continue with Tripundram account.

- Feels new account lacks trust, buyers want COD.



Resolution:

- Executive will discuss with manager about refund.

- Executive will arrange a call with senior manager.



Next Steps: 

- Manager will call the customer back.



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- refund, account closure, buyleads, cash on delivery
